Name: 'Stroganoff'
Directions: 'Saute chopped onion & garlic in a little butter. Add meat
Ingredients: cook till completely brown. Add sliced mushrooms & cook with meat. Add soup (undiluted)
column4: then sour cream. Heat till hot; sprinkle with parsley. Serve over noodles'
column5: 1! lb! ground meat! 1! small! onion! 1! clove! garlic! 1! lb! mushrooms! 1! can! cream of chicken soup! 1! lb! sour cream! 3! c! cooked noodles! 1/2! c! snipped parsley
